title: Indonesia’s GoTo more than doubles half-year net loss; takes over crypto firm
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Indonesia’s biggest e-commerce company GoTo on August 30 posted a half-year net loss of 14.17 trillion rupiah ($955 million), more than double compared with the loss of 6.62-trillion rupiah it recorded in the same period last year. The tech firm,

The post Indonesia’s GoTo more than doubles half-year net loss; takes over crypto firm appeared first on Investvine.
